com.castsoftware.jira.util

Class SqlStatements

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.castsoftware.jira.util.SqlStatements

  • public class SqlStatements
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class SqlStatements stores the sql statement used to retrieve the action plan stored in the database

    1.1
    Author:
    FME
